It's a powerful and intense film that explores the Irish War of Independence, with two brothers fighting against British forces. The performances by Orla Fitzgerald and Padraic Delaney are also noteworthy.

If that doesn't quite hit the spot, I'd also recommend "The Monuments Men". It's a unique blend of war and art, following an unlikely platoon as they work to rescue masterpieces from German thieves during World War II. With an all-star cast including George Clooney, Matt Damon, and Bill Murray, it's a fun and engaging watch.

I think I've got just the thing for you! Have you considered "End of Watch"? It's a gripping war drama that follows two young police officers as they navigate the dangers of their job in LA. The documentary-style filming and strong performances from Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Peña make it a compelling watch.

If you're looking for something a bit more action-packed, I'd recommend "Blood Diamond" instead. This intense thriller stars Leonardo DiCaprio as a diamond smuggler and Djimon Hounsou as a Mende fisherman caught up in the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war. The stunning visuals and powerful performances make it a must-see!
